title: Content Creator Alyne Tamir shares the story of her friend, “Pakistan”
text:
American content creator and tourist Alyne Tamir with a Youtube channel called ‘Dear Alyne’ has posted a video on Pakistan entitled, ‘TERRORISM TO TOURISM’ on Wednesday.

The video delineates how the West had always told horror stories about Pakistan but coming here and witnessing everything is certainly a pleasant experience with people being generous and hospitable.

Currently, Alyne is in Pakistan and the photos and videos she is posting are displaying how lovable Pakistan really is.

Before coming here, she took to Instagram to tell fans about the reason for her visit. she wrote, “Hello PAKISTAN! Visiting a country that (to be honest) didn’t have the greatest reputation in the US. Growing up I ONLY heard negative things. But lately, I’ve heard GREAT things! What gets to the news usually doesn’t represent the actual daily life.”

Related: Pakistan offers tax holiday for foreign investments in tourism sector

In her very next post, she ditched her “boring clothes” because dresses here are “way better.” Wearing Jasmine hand garlands, she spoke about hearing she has got Pakistani features. “Day 1 as PAKIST-ALYNE! I heard I have Pakistani features so I’m blending right in. ALSO I packed only 1 shirt and 1 pants, and I’m happy I did because the clothes here are WAY BETTER! Goodbye to my boring clothes, hello to Pakistani style!”

Donning a traditional Balochi dress and complementing it with truck art on a local bus, she wrote, “Hello, it’s me, your local Karachi Bus Driver – coming to pick you up IN STYLE! Taking this photo was a cultural experience.” She paid gratitude to Karachi for “the great day.”

And since ‘Whosoever hasn’t seen Lahore hasn’t really lived’, so Alyne packed her bags for Lahore to enjoy the cuisine and obviously, to visit the acclaimed Wagah Border. With “India photobombing” in her otherwise exquisite photo with two security personnel, she told her parents she is fine. ”

Following Lahore, she planned to visit up North with her cute unicorn.

In one of her Instgaram stories, Alyne spoke about how she had always been told about the gorgeous mountains of Switzerland and nothing about the Nothern areas of Pakistan which is equally beautiful if not more. She donned a traditional attire posing for a bunch of photos in the midst of Lake Attabad.

It is not the first time a renown tourist has visited Pakistan. Famous content creators like Eva Zu Beck, Drew Binsky, Rosie Gabrielle, Alexander — the Rickshaw guy, amongst others have been visiting Pakistan and speaking at length about the beauty it possesses and the hospitality they get from the people of Pakistan.
